sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    task
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
  import axios from "axios";

  export default {
    data: () => ({
      tasks: [],
      access_token: "",
      client: "",
      uid: "",
    }),
    mounted() {
      this.access_token = this.$cookies.get("access-token");
      this.client = this.$cookies.get("client", response.headers["client"]);
      this.uid = this.$cookies.get("uid", decodeURI(response.headers["uid"]));
    },
    methods: {
      async getTasks() {
        axios
          .get("/api/v1/tasks", {
            headers: {
              "access-token": this.access_token,
              client: this.client,
              uid: this.uid,
            },
          })
          .then((response) => {
            this.tasks = response.data();
            console.log(this.tasks);
          })
          .catch((error) => {
            console.error(error);
            console.error(error.response);
          });
      },
    },
  };
</script>
